name: TailorMed
overview:
TailorMed allows customers to design and buy custom made Scrubs online.

Their 4 step design process allows users to choose options for styles, colors & fabrics, design elements such as pockets and trim color and sizing. Every garment is then made-to-order and shipped directly to the customer.

The founders of TailorMed set out to bring a bit of ‘innovation’ to a market they felt wasn’t fully meeting customer’s needs. By making every garment ‘to order’ TailorMed is able to offer literally millions of unique combinations for a garment.

As posted on their website in the ‘About Us’ section, TailorMed:

“Our business was founded after hearing from friends and family that had difficulty finding scrubs that met their design expectations and fit them well. We began thinking about a product offering that could help - and TailorMed was born. The concept is simple: let’s allow our customers to choose what they want.”
